chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type
eq_X_dec: eqdec X
x: X
l: list (X * Y)

Goal:
In x (map fst l) -> {y : Y | list_assoc x l = Some y /\ In (x, y) l}

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
list_assoc = fix list_assoc (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)) {struct l} : option Y := match l with | nil => None | (y, a) :: l0 => if eq_X_dec x y then Some a else list_assoc x l0 end : X -> list (X * Y) -> option Y Arguments list_assoc _ _%list_scope
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
eqdec = fun X : Type => forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y} : Type -> Type Arguments eqdec _%type_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
list_assoc_In : forall (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)), match list_assoc x l with | Some y => In (x, y) l | None => ~ In x (map fst l) end
list_assoc_eq : forall (x : X) (y : Y) (l : list (X * Y)) (x' : X), x = x' -> list_assoc x' ((x, y) :: l) = Some y
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
in_prod_aux : forall (A B : Type) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list B), In y l -> In (x, y) (map (fun y0 : B => (x, y0)) l)
in_prod_iff : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (list_prod l l') < -> In x l /\ In y l'
list_assoc_neq : forall (x : X) (y : Y) (l : list (X * Y)) (x' : X), x <> x' -> list_assoc x' ((x, y) :: l) = list_assoc x' l
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l')
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type eq_X_dec : eqdec X x : X l : list (X * Y) |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type eq_X_dec : eqdec X x : X l : list (X * Y) |- Type] ?AA : [X : Type Y : Type eq_X_dec : eqdec X x : X l : list (X * Y) |- Type] ?AF : [X : Type Y : Type eq_X_dec : eqdec X x : X l : list (X * Y) |- Type]
in_combine_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In x l
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> In (f x) (map f l)
in_combine_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In (x, y) (combine l l') -> In y l'
Refl.make_impl_map : forall (A B : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (eval' : A * B -> Prop) (l : list (A * B)) (r : Prop), (forall x : A * B, eval' x <-> eval (fst x)) -> Refl.make_impl eval' l r < -> Refl.make_impl eval (map fst l) r
In_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> exists n : nat, nth_error l n = Some x
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
Permutation_in : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), l ~p l' -> In x l -> In x l'
Tauto.eval_cnf_app : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop) (env : Env) (x y : list (Tauto.clause Term' Annot)), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (rev_append x y) < -> Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env x /\ Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env y
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
ZMicromega.max_var_nformalae_correct : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (p : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z) (o : RingMicromega.Op1) (v : BinNums.positive), In (p, o) l -> In v (ZMicromega.vars BinNums.xH p) -> BinPos.Pos.le v (ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae l)
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul...
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : nil ~p nil | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> x :: l ~p x :: l' | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), y :: x :: l ~p x :: y :: l | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> l' ~p l'' -> l ~p l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (map f l) n = Some (f d)
Tauto.eval_cnf_and_opt : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop) (env : Env) (x y : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.and_cnf_opt x y) < -> Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (Tauto.and_cnf x y)
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => y | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
in_split_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (p : A * B), In p l -> In (fst p) (fst (split l))
in_split_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)) (p : A * B), In p l -> In (snd p) (snd (split l))
ZMicromega.max_var_nformulae_correct_aux : forall (l : list (EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1)) (p : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z) (o : RingMicromega.Op1) (v : BinNums.positive), In (p, o) l -> In v (ZMicromega.vars BinNums.xH p) -> BinPos.Pos.le v (fold_left ZMicromega.F l BinNums.xH)
ZMicromega.ZChecker = fix ZChecker (l : list (RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z)) (pf : ZMicromega.ZArithProof) {struct pf} : bool := match pf with | ZMicromega.DoneProof => false | ZMicromega.RatProof w pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w with | Some f => if ZMicromega.Zunsat f then true else ZChecker (f :: l) pf0 | None => false end | ZMicromega.CutProof w pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w with | Some f => match ZMicromega.genCuttingPlane f with | Some cp => ZChecker (ZMicromega.nformula_of_cutting_plane cp :: l) pf0 | None => true end | None => false end | ZMicromega.EnumProof w1 w2 pf0 => match ZMicromega.eval_Psatz l w1 with | Some f1 =>...
hd_error_cons : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), hd_error (x :: l) = Some x
in_elt : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l1 l2 : list A), In x (l1 ++ x :: l2)
